features: Hardcover Spiral Notebooks - 4 pack spiral notebook with 4 colors, Spiral Journals with 80 sheets/ 160 pages per pack and the size is 5.7"x8.3", standard easy-peel college ruled 8mm paper, 100gsm which avoids ink bleeding. Ruled notebook journal pages with smooth surfaces, can bring you better writing and drawing experience.

Stable Twin-wire Binding - The lined journal is made of a double row of twin-wire binding, beautiful and durable, stable and firm. Coil binding can secure the inner pages together without scattering. Writing can also ensure the convenience of turning pages. 4 different color Hardcover, which can help you better classify and find the records so that your notes are more complete and orderly.

Ruled Lined and Premium Paper - 80 gsm paper, 80 sheets/160pages 8mm Ruled Lined. We used original ecological acid-free paper with high ink proof to help prevent bleed-through. Suit for most pen types, such as ballpoint pens, gel pens, fountain pens, fine liner pens, and glitter pens. The inner paper from curling and keeping it flat. Our thread-bound notebook is designed to lay flat, making it easier to write for both right and left-handed users.

Sturdy Transparent Covers - Journal notebook covers are firm, waterproof frosted plastic. They do not bend backward easily, which is to protect the pages. And the plastic hard cover makes it tough enough to write when you're standing. You can also DIY your own cover on the first page. Let's bring a notebook, and write down our emotions, record the little things in life, collect a memory, and write a happy mood.

Widely Purpose Notebook - These 4-color notebooks can be suitable for a variety of occasions, like the classroom, office, home, library, and so on. These notebooks can absolutely meet all kinds of needs, such as office use, study, painting, diary, and so on. It can also record your daily life or the interesting things during your travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I screwed up and thought these were full size notebooks. Whoops! So the didn’t work for my kid but they are great for my home office for keeping notes and for recipes in the kitchen. Plus they are cute and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect size to take notes. Perfect Line space light pages and I love the colorful cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These notebooks arrived minutes ago. I opened one and wrote on the second page, in order to not smear the inside cover with ink. I'm very happy with the cover, and I very much like the lined, tinted pages. I've used a lot of different paper and a lot of notebooks over my 7 decades. These gratify me. Oh, and each notebook was individually placed in its own clear "envelope", inside the clear "package envelope". A thoughtful caution. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for writing, smaller than a typical notebook
reviews.reviewText: These are really great notebooks for everyday writing. I love the gradient design on these, it makes them completely unique from any other notebook I've seen before. The binding is very good and I found that the pages are thick enough to handle many different types of markers and pens without bleeding through. I will make a comment on the size of the notebooks themselves. These are not your traditional notebook size. They are slightly smaller, so keep that in mind when ordering. However, with that said, I feel like this is a good quality notebook set that can be used for a variety of different purposes. Gorgeous colors, fun to use...I personally use them for writing stories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Real Gem!
reviews.reviewText: These journals are of great quality, size, and colors! I wasn't sure what I was ordering but overjoyed to discover such great quality paper and journals. I have already shared them with friends. I will definitely be ordering more. The size allows me to carry in sachel to write wherever I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I searched two big box stores and two office supply stores and couldn't find what I wanted. I wanted small binder ring to fit in my Bible case. These were perfect. Every place I looked in person had the big rings which didn't fit and I hate. My pen also wrote very smoothly on the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The right size
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for writing lists and notes.
